fields.description:
Description:
Soft keyboard disappears when device is rotated to landscape mode. 
The same issue also exists on: 
- Hide Soft Keyboard (Android) (KitchenSink-Base UI-Hide Soft Keyboard (Android));
- Keyboard (KitchenSink-Controls-Textfield-Keyboard).
This bug occurs only on Droid 2.2.3 and exists also on 1.8.2.

Steps:
1. Run KitchenSink
2. Go to Controls-TextField-Events
3. Tap to text field to get soft keyboard up
4. Rotate device while keyboard is up

Expected result:
Soft keyboard should not disappear

Actual result:
Soft keyboard disappears
fields.summary: Android: TextField: Soft keyboard disappears when device is rotated to landscape mode on Droid 2.2.3
